I never once said I knew what I was doing all along. I actually said I went to this other site and they helped me through 1 post but for you guys its all questions and never answers so please before you start trying to troll get your facts straight. TBH, I’m laughing so hard right now cause all you guys are doing is making a complete fool of yourself. How you may ask?

item.title: CraftBukkit Client?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“NotLikingThis, post:14, topic:424698”]LMFAO!

  1. Why didn’t you say that in the first place and you know what I would rather have people pay to play then be able to use my username and log on so stop saying to make it false cause if it was a GOOD idea then the console wouldn’t be saying anything. Learn something about minecraft servers before posting k?
  2. I am being a prick to you guys cause you deserve it and the first KID “CoonHunter” started this whole thing with his second post and look he read what I said and never posted back. Kinda funny huh?
  3. There IS NO CLIENT ON MINECRAFT.NET TO DOWNLOAD FOR THE SERVER SO WHY SAY "The client IS the minecraft client cause its not there I checked everywhere.
    You guys keep posting the same shit over and over and its not helping. I got real help on one of the recommended sites on minecraft.net and they helped me no problem with it but it seems like you guys ask way more questions then you do help people… Kinda sad how you call this a community but none of you high rep chodes know what your talking about.
    @reyx7 Don’t post on my topics cause for one no one cares if you are laughing or not. This isn’t a place for you to post something retarded just cause your laughing. I’m laughing too considering you guys all post when i am being a prick you just because I called you guys out.
    LOL I already play checkers actually and I think I’m pretty good at it but I still play computer games and play sports at school.(Soccer, Football, baseball etc.)
    I bet I know more about minecraft servers now then what you all do and I learned this all in 1 day from 1 post lmfao.
    @hat trix Really? As I posted before your client you gave me didn’t even work when I turned online mode to false lmfao so stop thinking you know it all when you clearly don’t. I actually don’t have or host a private server all my servers have been released on google and rune-server cause those are the sites where people go on to learn and not leech like moparscape losers.(you and everyone else)
    Your server didn’t even work if you want to get technical cause I said I wanted flight mode on and when I turn it on it never works so what’s that saying???
    On my BUKKIT server I can use fly by typing a command in to do it.
    Yes I am a premium user and will be for as long as i continue playing minecraft servers and I have a total of 50 players online right now and my vps is hosting my minecraft server currently.[/quote]

fake and gay, trying to play it off

P.s, nobody started anything, it was you who took offence to our directions despite them being so simple, and you got mad when you couldnt understand what we were trying to tell you

Read full topic

item.title: CraftBukkit Client?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

if you are a premium user, use the download to moparcrafts client at minecraft.net/download

if you learn to read…

Minecraft for Windows Download Minecraft.exe (270 KB). Place it anywhere you want, then run it. Show all platforms

the above is your client download for minecraft.

Multiplayer Server If you're running on Windows and just want to set up a server easily, download Minecraft_Server.exe (802 KB) and run it. If you want to run the server on any other OS or without GUI it's a bit more involved (see this wiki article for a tutorial). First make sure you can use java from the command line. On Linux and Mac OS X this should already be set up but on Windows you might have to tinker with the PATH environment variable. Download and run minecraft_server.jar (621 KB) with java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar nogui.

the above is your download for minecraft.

being that you have came to a buckit server community straight out of moparscape and you have no clue what you are doing, most of us figured you weren’t premium. use the client provided above to download and play, ALONG WITH THE SERVER.

we know what we are talking about, you dont(obviously). last post of help i am giving you. if you dont figure it out, go somewhere else.

flight mode doesnt give you the ability to fly, it kicks you if you are flying. change your game mode to either 1 or 2.

Read full topic

item.title: CraftBukkit Client?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

NotLikingThis:

Just stop wasting you pathetic lives on this shit and go do something else.

Are you fucking kidding me?

You post a simple fix question, someone answers, and you turn into a total prick.
You do not need any special “client” to log into a bukkit server. If it says server outdated, then the server isn’t running on the same version as your minecraft, which I can not diagnose from here because I don’t know what version you’re on.

If you’re wanting a server where nobody has to pay, then you HAVE to set online mode to false to prevent the server from checking for a verified login from the Minecraft.net servers.

If you cannot understand beyond this, please delete your bukkit server and go play checkers or something.

Read full topic

item.title: CraftBukkit Client?
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

OMG look at all this help I am getting now that I called you guys out lmfao. Pretty bad how I have to say some mean things to get peoples attention.(This site blows as of support if I have to do that)

  1. It says its a bad idea to leave it false CAUSE people can USE my USERNAME and be admin if they want. Why would I want that???
  2. You guys aren’t helping by saying the same thing each time cause for one, you guys are wrong about that chode before helping cause he didn’t post one thing on my topic with some helpful information.
  3. Don’t keep flaming my topics cause all I asked was for help not for some little 12 year olds to start some shit and act tough online when irl I’d smack the living shit out of all of you.
    I’m done. Ill use the sites that minecraft.net recommend for help cause if you notice, this site isn’t on there. Stop making sites that you don’t even have permission to do cause all this one is, is a imitation of moparscape which is the worst site for rsps stuff.
    EDIT: The client IS the minecraft client isn’t helping me one bit cause if you check minecraft.net, they don’t have a download for the client so how was I supposed to know I needed to go to thepiratebay.org to get a minecraft client there? You guys MAY think you know it all buy you don’t cause for one the client that hat trix linked me to didn’t work and neither did the source he linked me to. Just stop wasting you pathetic lives on this shit and go do something else.
